Text: thank you Mister Nepotu - as quick as light as usual - one question for you if you don't mind - will you be doing the final four NCAA tournament? if not, don't worry about it.. you take care man...

thank you so much - love NCAA basket-ball myself... :-)   used to have so many games in the past - a defective hard drive later and there you go... all gone... :-(    merci mon ami!

sorry mate... another question - some games (like this one) downloaded recently are giving me problems... i play them with VLC but they don't play very well... it's impossible to watch them actually... the video doesn't hold it together and after a while, I stop it as it gives me a headache... :-(
I use k-lite codecs and BS player. It work perfect.
ok thank you... i will try bsplayer now. keep well! ;-)

GOT BS PLAYER AND IT WORKS PERFECT!
